name: CUSTOM DESIGN, PATTERNMAKING AND SEWING
description: To inquire about custom design, pattern making or sewing you can use the contact form at Selvedge Sewing to initiate contact and view the look book. This is a place holder for those who would like to pay for services through PayPal. To pay for a service, add the item to your cart, then increase the quantity until the amount matches your quote or invoice.

name: Private Pattern Making and Sewing Lessons
description:
Book me by the hour to teach you exactly what you want to learn.  If you can get a group of up to four to split the hourly cost, you are welcome to do that.  

PLEASE CALL OR EMAIL and book the session first before you pick the number of hours and pay.  When you contact me we can discuss what it is you are after and how many hours and what supplies it might require.
